name: Super BOO Quest
description: Super BOO Quest is a lighthearted game suitale for every kind of player, from casual to hardcore. It is a mix of arcade, puzzle, and stealth, to be played alone or with a friend. The game is presented with 16 bit-style graphics, as a tribute to Super Nintendo.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
